name: A Night with the Obda
description:
After a long trek through the forest and strange dreams under the canopied sky, you find yourself woken up to a finger on the sole of your foot...

This is the result of me discovering the entry of an exceptionally strange creature in a compendium of fairies and monsters. I haven't heard of it anywhere else, though that may be because my Russian is poor.

This is also an experiment in using Blink, made by Bloomengine, though I'm not sure it's still under development at this point.

The game was originally made in 2013.
